attributes.action: Change the law of holding a knife
attributes.additional_details:
I’m sick of hearing about all these kids at ages of 13  being killed by a knife

It is absolutely disgusting and getting worse and worse by the day we all need to say stop and make a stand for our children. 

No more knife crime this has to end
attributes.background: I think If someone if found with a knife it should be an automatic 5 year sentence

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase sentences relating to knife crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563199

Minimum 10-year sentence for knife possession and 20 years for use of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580709

Zero Tolerance on Knife Crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581806
